description: This is a Java source file defining a Spring Data JPA repository interface for User entities, including methods for finding users by username and checking username existence.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for accessing User entities in the database, providing methods for user lookup by username and existence checks.

methods.name: findByUsername
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the User entity that matches the provided username.

methods.name: existsByUsername
methods.description: Checks if a user with the specified username exists in the database.
